Package controller_controllerfiles

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
controller_controllerfiles.MainController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The controller class for the main page screen of the project.
Author:
Sage Ellefson

    • onAddPartMainScreen

      void onAddPartMainScreen(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method controls the add button on the part table. On action, this button takes you to the add part scene.
      Parameters:
      event - Add button on part table.
      Throws:
      IOException - From FXMLLoader.

    • getPartToModify

      static Part getPartToModify()
      This method gets what part is to be modified.
      Returns:
      Returns a part.

    • onModifyPartMainScreen

      void onModifyPartMainScreen(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method controls the modify button on the part table. On action, this button takes you to the modify part scene and loads the selected row into the text fields.
      Parameters:
      event - Modify button on the part table.
      Throws:
      IOException - From FXMLLoader.

    • deleteButtonPushedPart

      void deleteButtonPushedPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method controls the delete button for the part table on the main scene. If no row is selected, an error message from alertOptions will be called.
      Parameters:
      event - Delete button on the part table.

    • onAddProductMainScreen

      void onAddProductMainScreen(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method controls the add button on the product table. On action, this button takes you to the add product scene.
      Parameters:
      event - Add button on product table.
      Throws:
      IOException - From FXMLLoader.

    • getProductToModify

      public static Product getProductToModify()
      This method gets what part is to be modified.
      Returns:
      productToModify Returns a product.

    • onModifyProductMainScreen

      void onModifyProductMainScreen(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method controls the modify button on the product table. On action, this button takes you to the modify product scene and loads the selected row into the text fields.
      Parameters:
      event - Modify button on the product table.
      Throws:
      IOException - From FXMLLoader.

    • deleteButtonPushedProduct

      void deleteButtonPushedProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method controls the delete button for the product table on the main scene. If no row is selected, an error message from alertOptions will be called.
      Parameters:
      event - Delete button on the product table.

    • searchPartTable

      void searchPartTable(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method is used for the search button on the part table of the main scene.
      Parameters:
      event - Search button on the part table of the main scene.

      This method is used for the search button on the product table of the main scene.
      Parameters:
      event - Search button on the product table of the main scene.

    • onMainExitButton

      void onMainExitButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method is for the exit button on the main scene. This method closes the application when clicked.
      Parameters:
      event - Exit button action.

    • alertOptions

      private void alertOptions(int alerts)
      This method provides alerts and error messages. A switch statement with cases is used to contain alerts that can be called by numbers 2-6.
      Parameters:
      alerts - Alert message options.
